statements: DELETE FROM user_authentication WHERE user_id = 1 AND username = 'john_doe';
DELETE FROM user_authentication WHERE authenticated = false AND password = 'secure_password';
DELETE FROM authentication_logs WHERE logout_time IS NULL;
DELETE FROM authentication_logs WHERE user_id = 10 AND logout_time IS NULL;
DELETE FROM authentication_logs WHERE user_id = (SELECT user_id FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe');
DELETE FROM quantum_systems WHERE system_name = 'Quantum Computer System';
